alert.note: Alert for San Rafael Swell; Western Canyonlands (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 3:57PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Wayne and southeastern Emery Counties through 445 PM MDT... At 357 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 20 miles north of Hanksville, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Goblin Valley. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 between mile markers 125 and 136. Utah Route 24 between mile markers 123 and 152. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
